thag2.4:0.4_0: Standing on the bank of the Ganges river.
thag2.4:1.1_0: My hut on the bank of the Ganges
thag2.4:1.2_0: is made from three palm leaves.
thag2.4:1.3_0: My alms-bowl is a funeral pot,
thag2.4:2.1_0: In my first two rainy seasons
thag2.4:2.4_0: the mass of darkness was shattered.
thag2.4:2.5_0: the Ganges, Yamunā, Aciravatī, Sarabhū, and Mahī—
